Sentencas: The stability of Ni-YSZ anodes as part of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) towards redox cycling is an important issue for successfully introducing the technology.
Titulo: A depth-resolved in-situ study of the reduction and oxidation of Ni-based anodes in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Detailed knowledge of the NiO-Ni transitions and their impact on the mechanical integrity of the whole system is necessary to improve the overall stability.
Titulo: A depth-resolved in-situ study of the reduction and oxidation of Ni-based anodes in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In the present paper, a unique in-situ X-ray diffraction setup is presented which allows monitoring of the local structural changes during processing of SOFCs.
Titulo: A depth-resolved in-situ study of the reduction and oxidation of Ni-based anodes in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: With this setup technological SOFCs - a half cell and a full cell - were studied with respect to NiO-Ni transitions in repeated reduction-oxidation cycles, under conditions relevant for SOFC application.
Titulo: A depth-resolved in-situ study of the reduction and oxidation of Ni-based anodes in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It was found that the redox kinetics is a function of the sample depth.
Titulo: A depth-resolved in-situ study of the reduction and oxidation of Ni-based anodes in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Ni particles further away from the surface were reduced/oxidized at a slower rate than particles close to the surface.
Titulo: A depth-resolved in-situ study of the reduction and oxidation of Ni-based anodes in solid oxide fuel cells
